en.message: Texas DPS is cracking down on automated scheduling services at this time. We're investigating whether we can mitigate these issues to continue service, but as per our Terms of Service we cannot guarantee this. Please use the official Texas DPS website in the meantime, and contact Autobook TX support on Facebook if you have any questions.
